name: My Forest Home Deluxe
description:
About the Game
Pixel animator Chimerazak falls victim to the "Critical Bliss" treatment as his once simple mini game about a large breasted lumberjack turns into a casual metroidvania experience! Enjoy exploring a new environment while trying your best to fend off monsters who are prepared to fuck everything that moves!
My Forest Home has been completely reworked its original version! You can look forward to even more animations, newly illustrated CGs, secret bonus content, reworked ost, and even more NPCs for Azumi's magical futa cock!
[Premise]
You play as a Lumberjack who needs to quickly rebuild her house in the forest before she gets invaded buy horny creatures roaming around. Gather resources, fight off monsters, build a house, sell resources for money, and buy "special" goods.
My Forest Home Deluxe also comes with all of ChimeraZak's previous mini games (as well as a new one!). It won't come easy though! You have a puzzle to solve and a rather tough secret boss fight ahead of you.
[Features]
Gamepad Support
16:9 Resolution
Original Soundtrack
Partial Voice Acting
Gallery Mode
Language Select
Lewd Nightmare Mode (Don't get fucked once or you start over.)
Over 35+ Animations
Newly Added CGs Illustrated by Lustfire
Hidden Bonus Content and Extra Mini Games
Achievements and Trading Cards![Other]If the game seems complicated, you can lower the difficulty level in the settings.
